Alle unsere Filtersysteme laufen komplet: All our filter systems function entirely without the addition of chemical substances. This makes them easy to handle and particularly resource-friendly.
Da wir eine kleine Organisation mit flac: Since we are a small organization with flat hierarchies, we work very effectively. Virtually every euro goes to the goal of the statutes because we don't have to finance a huge administrative apparatus.
Dein Kommentar konnte leider nicht gespe: Dein Kommentar konnte leider nicht gespeichert werden, probiere es später bitte noch einmal

Dennoch leiden weltweit 2,2 Milliarden M: Dennoch leiden weltweit 2,2 Milliarden Menschen Durst oder erkranken an verschmutztem Wasser. Unsere Mission ist es, diesen Menschen durch sauberes Trinkwasser eine existentielle Lebensgrundlage zu ermöglichen.
Die WeWater gemeinnützige UG ist laut Be:
According to the decision of January 2nd, 2019, the WeWater non-profit UG is recognized as non-profit by the Tax Office for Corporations I (Bredtschneiderstraße 5, 14057 Berlin) according to § 60a Paragraph 1 AO as non-profit .

Donations to the WeWater non-profit UG are tax-deductible in accordance with Section 10b (1) EStG. We confirm that the donation will only be used to promote charitable purposes in the sense of promoting development cooperation in accordance with Section 52 Paragraph 2 Clause 1 No. (n) 15 AO.

Donations up to At 300 Euro (new since 01.01.2021, previously 200 €) annually you can claim without a donation receipt (§ 50 Abs. 2 Nr. 2 Letter b EStDV) for tax purposes. To do this, simply submit your account statement together with <14> this document for donations by December 31, 2020 (click link) or <16> this document for donations from 01.01.2021 (click link) to the tax office . Important: Please state the purpose of each donation by transfer (e.g. monthly donation, one-time donation, donation for project xy). This way we can correctly allocate your donation.

For donations over 300 euros from 01.01.2021 or over 200 euros annually by 31.12.2020 you need a donation receipt from us in order to to claim them for tax purposes . <24> Please send us an email to <1> hi@wewater.org with your full name and address . We will then send you your donation receipt by email.

You can find our statutes <31> here .

Grundsätzlich werden bei gemeinnützigen: In general, administrative, organizational or even wage costs are viewed as critical in non-profit organizations. We are currently working with very low administrative costs. This includes costs for website hosting, fees for an SSL certificate, account management fees, and costs for legal advice and tax advisors. At the moment we have no wage costs. Nevertheless, from a certain size, wage expenditure will be indispensable.

Höchste Qualität Made in Germany, aber o: Highest quality made in Germany, but without profit intentions. Our production partners manufacture the filter systems at cost price. This allows us to use them in projects at particularly favorable prices. One liter of filtered water costs less than 0.01€!

Kein Strom und keine weitere Infrastrukt: No electricity and no other infrastructure needed! Place the filter, let the water run through it. That’s it. The filtration process is achieved by force of gravity alone.

Seit unserer Gründung 2018 setzen wir un: Seit unserer Gründung 2018 setzen wir unsere Filtersysteme in eigenen Spendenprojekten sowie zusammen mit NGO-Partnern ein. 8300 Menschen in 8 Dörfern, Schulen und Krankenhäusern haben damit inzwischen eine Lebensgrundlage geschaffen, auf die sie aufbauen können.

Drinking water is a human right.
Unsere Filterlösungen funktionieren mit: Our filter solutions feature an innovative and highly reliable filter membrane. 99.9999% of all bacteria, particles, suspended solids or other organic contaminants are retained and do not enter the filtered water - certified by the BCS laboratory in Florida.
Unsere Gemeinnützigkeit ist vom Finanzam: Our non-profit status is recognized by the tax office.
WeWater arbeitet ehrenamtlich sowie auf: WeWater works on a voluntary basis as well as on a donation basis. Therefore we are dependent on financial help to realize water projects. Help now with a donation.
Weil’s an Trinkwasser mangelt, nicht an: Because there is a lack of drinking water, not good ideas.
Wir arbeiten ehrenamtlich und beziehen k: We work on a voluntary basis and do not receive any salary, benefits in kind or any other compensation.
Wir arbeiten transparent, haben unsere S: We work transparently, have published our statutes and in the blog you can follow exactly what is happening with your donations.
